original_title: สายสัมพันธ์
overview: Lin' a young daughter who secretly transferred from the teacher to Communication Arts, only 'Non', the younger brother who knows. Lin returned home on New Year’s Eve to see her mother and grandmother, who were busy preparing for the Thai blessing ceremony next day. This is an occasion for family reunion, but the gathering was not as enjoyable as she had hoped. She also had to satisfy Grandma's request by going on a trip together. Lin had to deal with an increasing number of issues on this journey.
title: Blinded Boundary
